title: The Craft of Baking - Cakes, Cookies, and Other Sweets with Idea
description:
The Craft of Baking: Cakes, Cookies, and Other Sweets with Ideas for Inventing Your Own

By  Karen DeMasco (Author) , Mindy Fox (Author) 

Hardcover: 256 pages - Publisher: Clarkson Potter 
(October 27, 2009) - Language: English
ISBN-10: 0307408108 - ISBN-13: 978-0307408105

Using the bounty of the seasons as inspiration and KarenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s clear instructions, both beginners and experienced bakers will find it easy to let their creativity take the reins. Learn how to make KarenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s celebrated sweets, such as Apple Fritters with Caramel Ice Cream and Apple Caramel Sauce, White Chocolate Cupcakes with White Chocolate Cream Cheese Buttercream, and Raised Cinnamon-Sugar Doughnuts. Then check out the tips on "varying your craft" to transform Grandma RankinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Cashew Brittle into Pumpkin Seed Brittle and to alter a cobbler recipe to make Rhubarb Rose Cobbler in the spring or Mixed Berry Cobbler in the summer, for example. KarenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s suggestions for "combining your craft"Ã¢â‚¬â€œsuch as serving Almond Pound Cake with Apricot Compote and Lillet SabayonÃ¢â‚¬â€œreveal how easy it is to take desserts to the next level.

KarenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s ingenuity is boundless. All types of sweets, from muffins and scones to pies and cakes to ice creams and custards, are her mediums for exploring flavors. With KarenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s simple techniques, unique flavor combinations, and inventive ideas, The Craft of Baking will change the way you think about baking and equip any home cook with the skills and creativity to create amazing, one-of-a-kind desserts.
